name: Freezer, Locker Meat Provisioners
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that sell fresh, frozen, or cured meats, and fish, shellfish,
and other seafoods, and includes bulk retail sellers of meat for
freezer storage. Meat markets included in this MCC may butcher
their own animals, or buy meat from others.
For poultry shops, use MCC 5499.
